Articles.Content: well I was thinking what would happen if you crossed a b-1 and a x-wing what would happen.

Ryan, you need to post these pictures to the internet before you can share them. Set up an imgur account and deposit them there. You can then share them with the forum by sharing the link.

Www.imgur.com

hello Ryan,

did you get KSP through Steam? if so, you can take screen shots by pressing F12 in game and upload them to steam cloud (sorry if you already knew this). once uploaded copy the image link from steam and post it here.

hope this helps. i want to see your craft!

Edited October 17, 2013 by Capt Snuggler
